summary: This section provides insights into ecosystems with a focus on both biological and modern contexts, highlighting new practices like ecosystem architecture that emphasize decentralization and regenerative design. It features articles delving into the spatial and temporal nature of ecosystems and profiles on influential design and tech leaders, exemplified by Jan Hein Hoogstad, known as yeehaa.
excerpt: The article explores the biological and modern contextual meanings of ecosystems, proposing new practices in ecosystem architecture, emphasizing decentralization and regenerative design.
